PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Credit Card Default Risk Modelling and Customer Profitability
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
•Analyzed the credit card customer default data and customer profit and loss data for 900            customers.
•Designed an optimum predictive Binary Classification Model in Microsoft Excel which maximized the area under the ROC curve and minimized the default risk by minimizing the cost per event.
•Implemented Multivariate Linear Regression and developed a best fit model for predicting future applicant’s profits or losses.
•Measured the reduction in uncertainty with respect to both the models and recommended to use a combination of these models for predicting net risk associated with a customer or net customer profitability.

• Coordinated with a team of 6 members to complete the project within the prescribed time limit of 18 hours.

• Acquired first -hand experience of Welding, Brazing, Casting, Sheet-metal working and their relation with properties of the material
• Won the Best Project Award amongst 12 groups.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Effects of Stock Market Liquidity on real economic activity
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Implemented this study for a time frame of 1994-2011, which covered both periods of bull and    bear equity market.
 Adopted 4 low frequency liquidity measures which are ILR, RS, TUR and VTR for measuring stock market liquidity.
 Examined the macro variables- RGDP, RC, RI, UnR and control variables- HS, TS, MRP, DS for measuring economic activity.
 Designed a Multivariate linear regression model for analyzing the relationship between economic activity and liquidity measures.
 Observed strong positive correlation between HS and macro variables, and between liquidity measures and macro variables, concluded a direct relationship between stock market liquidity and real economic activity.

-Designed 7 models of an arch bridge in SAP software to interpret the forces and moments experienced by the structure.
-Analyzed the theoretical values given by SAP with the values experimental values using Microsoft Excel to predict the accuracy of the software.
-Recommended usage of SAP to simulate a real structure by taking into account several assumptions.
